verses.verse: Who has believed <S%H539><s%> our message? <S%H8052><s%> To whom has the arm <S%H2220><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> been revealed? <S%H1540><s%>

For he grew up <S%H5927><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him as a tender plant, <S%H3126><s%> and as a root <S%H8328><s%> out of dry <S%H6723><s%> ground. <S%H776><s%> He has no good looks <S%H8389><s%> or majesty. <S%H1926><s%> When we see <S%H7200><s%> him, <S%H4758><s%> there is no beauty that we should desire him. <S%H2530><s%>

He was despised, <S%H959><s%> and rejected <S%H2310><s%> by men; <S%H376><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of suffering, <S%H4341><s%> and acquainted <S%H3045><s%> with disease. <S%H2483><s%> He was despised <S%H959><s%> as <S%H4564><s%> one from whom men hide their face; <S%H6440><s%> and we didn't <S%H2803><s%> respect him.

Surely <S%H403><s%> he has borne <S%H5375><s%> our sickness, <S%H2483><s%> and carried <S%H5445><s%> our suffering; <S%H4341><s%> yet we considered <S%H2803><s%> him plagued, <S%H5060><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> by God, <S%H430><s%> and afflicted. <S%H6031><s%>

But he was pierced <S%H2490><s%> for our transgressions. <S%H6588><s%> He was crushed <S%H1792><s%> for our iniquities. <S%H5771><s%> The punishment <S%H4148><s%> that brought our peace <S%H7965><s%> was on him; <S%H2250><s%> and by his wounds we are healed. <S%H7495><s%>

All we like sheep <S%H6629><s%> have gone astray. <S%H8582><s%> Everyone <S%H376><s%> has turned <S%H6437><s%> to his own way; <S%H1870><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has laid <S%H6293><s%> on him the iniquity of us all. <S%H5771><s%>

He was oppressed, <S%H5065><s%> yet when he was afflicted <S%H6031><s%> he didn't <S%H6605><s%> open his mouth. <S%H6310><s%> As a lamb <S%H7716><s%> that is led <S%H2986><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2874><s%> and as a sheep <S%H7353><s%> that before <S%H6440><s%> its shearers <S%H1494><s%> is mute, <S%H481><s%> so he didn't <S%H6605><s%> open his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

He was taken <S%H3947><s%> away by oppression <S%H6115><s%> and judgment; <S%H4941><s%> and as for his generation, <S%H1755><s%> who considered <S%H7878><s%> that he was cut off <S%H1504><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> and stricken <S%H5061><s%> for the disobedience <S%H6588><s%> of my people? <S%H5971><s%>

They made <S%H5414><s%> his grave <S%H6913><s%> with the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and with a rich <S%H6223><s%> man in his death; <S%H4194><s%> although he had done <S%H6213><s%> no violence, <S%H2555><s%> neither was any deceit <S%H4820><s%> in his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Yet it pleased <S%H2654><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to bruise <S%H1792><s%> him. <S%H2470><s%> He has caused him to suffer. When you make <S%H7760><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> an offering for sin, <S%H817><s%> he shall see <S%H7200><s%> his seed. <S%H2233><s%> He shall prolong <S%H748><s%> his days, <S%H3117><s%> and the pleasure <S%H2656><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

After the suffering <S%H5999><s%> of his soul, <S%H5315><s%> he will see <S%H7200><s%> the light and be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%> My righteous <S%H6662><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> will justify <S%H6663><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> by the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of himself; <S%H5445><s%> and he will bear their iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>

Therefore will I divide <S%H2505><s%> him a portion with the great, <S%H7227><s%> and he shall divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> with the strong; <S%H6099><s%> because he poured out <S%H6168><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> to death, <S%H4194><s%> and was numbered <S%H4487><s%> with the transgressors; <S%H6586><s%> yet he bore <S%H5375><s%> the sin <S%H2399><s%> of many, <S%H7227><s%> and made intercession <S%H6293><s%> for the transgressors. <S%H6586><s%>
